Row.Text: Earn 90 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence from gifting Great People to City-States. Upon declaring friendship, Sweden and their friend receive +25% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People generation. Receive a free Great Scientist upon discovering Dynamite.
Fast Renaissance Era naval ranged unit that heals nearby friendly land units each turn and specializes in fighting in Coast. Only Gustavus' Sweden may build it.

The Regal Ship is a unqiue unit for Gustavus' Sweden, replacing the Frigate. Faster than the Frigate, the Regal Ship receives a +20% Combat Bonus in Coast tiles and heals nearby friendly land units for 10 HP per turn.

The Regal Ship was the Swedish designation for her largest ships, used between 1615-1622, and then from 1633 until the 1670s. Perhaps the most famous example of a Regal Ship was the Vasa Warship, which was constructed on the orders of Gustavus Adolphus. Although the warship sunk on its maiden voyage in 1628, her recovery in 1961 has proven an invalueable source of insight into the naval techniques of 17th century Sweden.
Heals nearby friendly land units for 10 HP per turn.
Strong Industrial Era gunpowder unit that heals every turn and specializes in fighting in Tundra and Snow. Only Gustavus' Sweden may build it.

The Carolean is a unique unit for Gustavus' Sweden, replacing the Rifleman. The Carolean receives a +25% Attack Bonus in Tundra and Snow tiles and starts with the March promotion, allowing it to heal every turn, even if it performs an action.
+25% Attack Bonus in Tundra and Snow tiles.
